channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Student Information System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Student Information System

item.title: CVE-2022-2797|2024-08-03T00:46:04.442Z -- sourcecodester -- student%20information%20system
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in SourceCodester Student Information System. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /admin/students/view_student.php. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. The attack can be launched remotely. The identifier VDB-206245 was assigned to this vulnerability.
